title: pro tip: don't update to the new client
body: it might look nicer, but it functions worse. there are no clubs, no spectate, hovering over runes in champ select doesn't display what's in them. sure, it might look nice and all, but its actually worse at the moment.

replies.body: It's still in beta, don't you remember? This means the client is still WIP. Also, you HAVE to make the switch sooner or later, so stop whinging about it

> [{quoted}](name=StealthVortex88,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YEGcTxHX,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-11T00:39:52.831+0000)
>
> It's still in beta, don't you remember? This means the client is still WIP. Also, you HAVE to make the switch sooner or later, so stop whinging about it

yeah, sooner or later. as in when its in full release. as in, not now. also, not whining. dumbass.

The title of your post and your whining shows that you haven't indicated that this client is in beta, nor the fact that you have to switch to it sooner or later. Just because you are wrong doesn't mean that you can shit on others

> [{quoted}](name=StealthVortex88,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YEGcTxHX,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-11-11T03:34:00.466+0000)
>
> The title of your post and your whining shows that you haven't indicated that this client is in beta, nor the fact that you have to switch to it sooner or later. Just because you are wrong doesn't mean that you can shit on others

at the time of the post I wasn't wrong. also, again, not whining. the point is you don't have to switch to it now. and I'm advising people that they should hold on off switching, because whilst the new client may look nicer, from a functionality standpoint the old one is better.

Now, where did I say you have to switch to it now? Again, your title, 'pro tip: don't update to the new client', doesn't even suggest that you're saying to upgrade later. Also, if you are just complaining about something, it is whining. No clubs? I'm sure that you found a solution to that situation.
Stop whining about the new client, it's way better than the legacy client
Hey, when we went to OCE we didn't have clubs on but it should be there now when you log back in. You will see all the clubs you had before.

its been 30min and I am not in game, so FML and FK RITO to fk this thing again

#Do not Update
Queue times are not affected at all by the change in client.
every time I need to wait like 10minute for normal game at the beginning  it went up-to 30min, now its 10min minimum -.- then why its happening with me ?

There are quite a few things that can cause you to have a longer queue time. Just at the moment it's likely the fact that many people are playing flex rather than normals. It would also be longer if you were playing on off-peak hours.
